title: S17 Ep66: A Flash Of Beauty: Bigfoot Revealed
itunes:title: A Flash Of Beauty: Bigfoot Revealed
description:
Tobe Johnson and Brett Eichenberger are co-producers of the new documentary, “A Flash of Beauty: Bigfoot Revealed”. In today's show, they talk about the interviews from researchers and eyewitnesses with extraordinary stories and evidence. They also discuss historical accounts of Bigfoot!

The film makes a strong case for the existence of Bigfoot and asks the viewer to examine the evidence and come to their own conclusion.

Watch the film, "A Flash Of Beauty: Bigfoot Revealed": https://www.bigfootdoc.com/

Check out Tobe Johnson's groundbreaking multimedia project, The Owl Moon Lab: A Paranormal Experiment (Bigfoot Chronicles: https://amzn.to/3wZy2tH
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
